biotools.summary: The Finding Optimizing and Reporting Cas Targets (FORCAST) pipeline enables researchers to design Cas-mediated mutagenesis experiments in model organisms with ease. It is a fully integrated and open source pipeline to design Cas-mediated mutagenesis experiments.

bioschemas.name: FORCAST
bioschemas.summary: The Finding Optimizing and Reporting Cas Targets (FORCAST) pipeline enables researchers to design Cas-mediated mutagenesis experiments in model organisms with ease. It is a fully integrated and open source pipeline to design Cas-mediated mutagenesis experiments.
